venue.name: Artesani Playground in Herter Park DCR (formerly MDC)

item.description:
Please join us for the 5th Annual AfHB 5K Run/Walk at Artesani Park on the Brighton Bank of the Charles River on Saturday morning, May 1, 2010. There will be entertainment, t-shirts and refreshments for runners, walkers and volunteers. Online registration can be found at: http://www.active.com...
You can email Michael"at"AfHB"dot"org if you want to sponsor the race or volunteer. We have two ongoing team competitions. Fastest school team - the BAC was the 2009 winner and the Fastest Firm team - Sasaki Associates were the 2009 champions and are the current holders of the AfHB Cup. Teams are scored with the fastest 3 runners from each school/firm and the times are handicapped for age & gender to level the field. We had over 300 runners in 2009 and the event is a lot of fun. All proceeds go to Architecture for Humanity.
item.name: 5th Annual AfHB 5k Run/Walk
